installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# FiveM Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

## Only download if a path is provided, otherwise continue.
apk add openssl tar xz curl git --no-cache

echo "cloning citizenfx files"

git clone https://github.com/citizenfx/cfx-server-data.git /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server

echo "Downloading the latest fivem server files"
latest_fivem_url=`curl https://runtime.fivem.net/artifacts/fivem/build_proot_linux/master/ | tail -3 | head -1 | cut -d'"' -f2`

echo -e "pulling files from https://runtime.fivem.net/artifacts/fivem/build_proot_linux/master/${latest_fivem_url}fx.tar.xz"
wget https://runtime.fivem.net/artifacts/fivem/build_proot_linux/master/${latest_fivem_url}fx.tar.xz

echo "Extracting fivem files"

tar xf fx.tar.xz alpine/opt/

mv -fin alpine/opt/cfx-server/ ./

chmod +x ./cfx-server/FXServer

rm -rf fx.tar.xz alpine/

if [ -e server.cfg ]; then
    echo "server config file exists"
else
    echo "Downloading default fivem config"
    curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/parkervcp/eggs/master/GTA/FiveM/server.cfg >> server.cfg
fi

echo "install complete"

exit 0
